name: Unidentified_Geroon
content:
Circa 18 BBY, on the planet Coruscant, the Cathar Sele told former Jedi Knight Jax Pavan that an acquaintance of his, a Geroon, owned a droid that he hired out to help individuals from outside Coruscant. The Cathar also informed Pavan that the droid saw someone wearing Umber House's seal near artist Ves Volette's conapt, hoping that that information was useful to the former Jedi.
The Geroon was mentioned in Michael Reaves' 2008 novel Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, the second installment in Reaves's Star Wars: Coruscant Nights trilogy.
